tech.title: Face tracking and segmentation
tech.name: video-face-tracking
tech.preview: Build ultimately personalized web and mobile solutions based on facial recognition. Let customers experience your business in a whole new way.

tech.title: Hair segmentation
tech.name: video-hair-segmentation
tech.preview: Let customers change hairstyles and hair colours at a click to find their perfect look. Boost your consumer satisfaction by offering an easy-to-use hair color changer.

tech.title: Action units detection (Avatar)
tech.name: video-action-units
tech.preview: Detect the movements of individual facial muscles and translate them into facial expressions. Track users’ moods and emotions.

tech.title: Occlusion detection
tech.name: video-occlusion
tech.preview: Apply robust facial recognition and tracking that works even with partial visibility of the face. Our technology supports occlusion up to 50%.

tech.title: Glasses detection
tech.name: video-glasses-detection
tech.preview: Power your analytics and marketing strategy with real-time robust glasses detection. Identify users who wear glasses and approach them with relevant and timely offers.

tech.title: Eye tracking
tech.name: video-eye-gaze-tracking
tech.preview: Get insight into your customers' visual attention. Track gaze direction with subpixel accuracy and detect precise eye movements to understand your users’ behaviour.

tech.title: Hands segmentation
tech.name: video-hands-segmentation
tech.preview: Apply robust real-time hand detection to create interactive game experiences and gesture-based interfaces. Provide virtual try-on services for jewellery and accessories.

tech.title: Beautification
tech.name: video-beautification
tech.preview: Let customers look good in the camera so that they have a good customer experience. Fix camera distortions and make beautification available on a wide range of devices.

tech.title: Eyes segmentation
tech.name: video-eye-segmentation
tech.preview: Apply robust eye detection in biometry, medical research and smart human-computer interaction solutions. Get accurate extraction and measurement of eye features like the center of the pupil, iris radius, and sclera.

tech.title: Background separation
tech.name: video-separation-from-bg
tech.preview: Remove backgrounds in real time to change them into the scenery of your choice. Apply static and animated textures during a live video call or photo/video shoot.

tech.title: Heart rate detection
tech.name: video-pulse-detection
tech.preview: Enable a contact-free heartbeat sensor on your device.  Detect viewers’ responses to commercials by measuring their heart rate via a camera in real time.
